staxel.village.dialogue.Cutesy.line:1000: Just between you and me, I love doughnuts!
The fluffy softness of the dough, the range of fillings and toppings...
They're just so perfect!
It really helps that they're zero calories too!
Ahhh...
What I wouldn't give to live in a castle...
I'd hire an army of maids, and a trusty butler to oversee them.
Their skirts would paint a rainbow of silken cloth!
The lipstick I ordered the other day was the wrong colour...
I ended up giving it away.
^c:1486b0;{0-tomboy_name}^c:pop; didn't seem to want it though...
I wonder what it would feel like to ride on a cloud.
Would it be as fluffy as it looks do you think?
Or just cold and damp?
You know what I'd love right now?
A nice cup of rose hip tea, steeped juuuust the right amount.
Wouldn't it be amazing if life was a musical?
We'd all dance and sing as we went about our daily chores.
I think everything would become far more enjoyable!
Someday I'm going to get a really cute pet.
I'll spend all day filming it and turn it into an internet celebrity!
I don't understand why everyone drinks so much coffee!
Even with a heap of sugar I can't get past the bitterness...
Hey ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
Would you mind if I gave some of your animals cute haircuts?
I think it would be a good way to promote your farm too!
Living out here in this rural town has its downsides.
It's so hard to get hold of the latest accessories!
By the time they ship them out here, fashions are already changing!
It's nice to have ^c:1486b0;{0-tomboy_name}^c:pop; around.
The village becomes a lot more lively!
I don't know if I've mentioned this, but we were childhood friends!
I wonder if my childhood friend will ever come back to the village?
They always livened the place up!
